text: The half brother of Afghan President Karzai is shot dead at his home in Kandahar province.
In Northern Ireland, rioting erupts on the streets of West Belfast before the start of a major Protestant march.
In Egypt, saboteurs blow up a natural gas pipeline that distributes supplies to Israel and Jordan.
In the Palestinian territories, Israeli troops use stun grenades to disperse demonstrators in Hebron.
US Secretary of State Clinton hosts a meeting on the Middle East in Washington DC.
Scientists launch a new data relay satellite in China's Sichuan province.
